translations: （主菜之外的）配菜；剪屑，修剪下来的东西；（衣服的）装饰品（trimming 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I think I understand what "all the trimmings" means now.
sentences.translation: 我想我现在明白“全副武装”是什么意思了。

sentences.sentence: All the trimmings—it means all the extra things that traditionally come with something to make it more special.
sentences.translation: 所有的点缀——是指所有额外的东西，那些传统上和某样东西一起并让它更特别的东西。

sentences.sentence: I adore Sunday lunch with all the trimmings: roast meat, along with lots of vegetables and sauces and other traditional accompaniments.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢周日的午餐，里面有各种各样的佐料：烤肉，还有很多蔬菜、酱汁和其他传统的佐料。
